mapper.sql: id, access_time, app_name, app_code, IP, client_type, rule_id, rule_name, rule_catalog_name, result_name
mapper.insert: insert into sys_ruleaccess_log (id, access_time, app_name, app_code, IP, client_type, rule_id, rule_name, rule_catalog_name, result_name) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{accessTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clientType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ruleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ruleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ruleCatalogName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resultName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into sys_ruleaccess_log
id,
access_time,
app_name,
app_code,
IP,
client_type,
rule_id,
rule_name,
rule_catalog_name,
result_name,

#{accessTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{appCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update sys_ruleaccess_log
access_time = #{accessTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
app_name = #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
app_code = #{appCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IP = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
client_type = #{clientType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rule_id = #{ruleId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rule_name = #{ruleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rule_catalog_name = #{ruleCatalogName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
result_name = #{resultName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sys_ruleaccess_log set access_time = #{accessTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, app_name = #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_code = #{appCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IP = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, client_type = #{clientType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rule_id = #{ruleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rule_name = #{ruleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rule_catalog_name = #{ruleCatalogName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, result_name = #{resultName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT t1.klgbase ,t2.rule,t3.qlf FROM ( SELECT SUM(item_num) AS klgbase, 'a' FROM klgbase_catalog ) t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(rule_num) AS rule, 'a' FROM rule_catalog ) t2 ON t1.a = t2.a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(id) AS qlf, 'a' FROM qlf_staff_baseinfo ) t3 ON t2.a = t3.a WHERE 1 = 1
